FuncDef: The display bgp routing-table command displays related information about BGP routes. The display bgp routing-table command displays related information about BGP routes.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies a destination IPv4 address.
It is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the mask length of the destination IP address.
The value is an integer in the range from 0 to 32.

Specifies the mask of an IPv4 address.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Matches according to the mask longer than the specified length.
-

ExtraInfo: To view the information about routes in the BGP routing table, run the display bgp routing-table command with specified parameters.
